title: Fragiles 2005 DVDR R4 NTSC
description:
After nearly a century, the Mercy Falls Children's Hospital is about to close its doors forever, but a train accident leaves local hospitals without beds and they will have to wait a few more days. Amy, a young nurse, is sent to try to work around the situation, but she soon detects something odd in the air. The children are nervous and afraid of something intangible, invisible, something they say live on the second floor: the floor that was closed and isolated forty years earlier. This mysterious presence becomes increasingly more evident and to unravel the mystery and protect children, Amy will face all fears. But the mystery is far greater than anyone expected. More obscure. More sinister. More dangerous.
